attributes.action: recycle all waste vegtableoil for public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all the vegatable oil in the uk was recycled into bio dieasal, we could save millons of pounds plus millons of co2 emmissions.  Use this wasted fuel supply to provide and promote our public transport system. Bio fuels put great demand on our food chains and enviroment.  There fore limit the use of the bio fuels to public transport only.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
